# This file was generated by the YaTool build system (https://github.com/yandex/yatool),
# from a source YaTool build configuration provided in ya.make files.
#
# If the repository supports both CMake and ya build configurations, please modify both of them.
#
# If only CMake build configuration is supported then modify only CMake files and note that only
# simple modifications are allowed like adding source-files to targets or adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories. These modifications will be ported to original ya.make files
# by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be easily ported back to the ya build
# system may be rejected.
#
# Please refer to the build instructions in the repository for more information about manual
# changes in this file.

find_package(linux-headers-generic REQUIRED)

get_built_tool_path(
  TOOL_protoc_bin
  TOOL_protoc_dependency
  contrib/tools/protoc/bin
  protoc
)

get_built_tool_path(
  TOOL_cpp_styleguide_bin
  TOOL_cpp_styleguide_dependency
  contrib/tools/protoc/plugins/cpp_styleguide
  cpp_styleguide
)

get_built_tool_path(
  TOOL_rescompiler_bin
  TOOL_rescompiler_dependency
  tools/rescompiler/bin
  rescompiler
)

add_executable(unittester-formats)


target_compile_options(unittester-formats PRIVATE
  -Wdeprecated-this-capture
  -Wimplicit-fallthrough
  -Wparentheses
  -Wno-logical-op-parentheses
  -Wno-bitwise-op-parentheses
)

target_link_libraries(unittester-formats PUBLIC
  linux-headers-generic::linux-headers-generic
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  cpp-testing-gtest
  cpp-testing-gtest_main
  yt-yt-build
  yt-core-test_framework
  yt-yt-core
  yt-yt-client
  yt-client-formats
  yt-library-formats
  yt-library-named_value
  libs-apache-arrow
  library-cpp-resource
  contrib-libs-protobuf
)

target_allocator(unittester-formats
  cpp-malloc-jemalloc
)

target_link_options(unittester-formats PRIVATE
  -ldl
  -lrt
  -Wl,--no-as-needed
  -fPIC
  -fPIC
  -lrt
  -ldl
  -lutil
)

target_proto_messages(unittester-formats PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/library/formats/unittests/protobuf_format_ut.proto
)

target_sources(unittester-formats PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/library/formats/unittests/arrow_parser_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/library/formats/unittests/dsv_parser_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/library/formats/unittests/dsv_writer_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/library/formats/unittests/protobuf_format_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/library/formats/unittests/row_helpers.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/library/formats/unittests/schemaful_dsv_parser_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/library/formats/unittests/schemaful_dsv_writer_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/library/formats/unittests/skiff_format_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/library/formats/unittests/skiff_yson_converter_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/library/formats/unittests/value_examples.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/library/formats/unittests/web_json_writer_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/library/formats/unittests/yamred_dsv_parser_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/library/formats/unittests/yamred_dsv_writer_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/library/formats/unittests/yaml_parser_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/library/formats/unittests/yaml_writer_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/library/formats/unittests/yamr_parser_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/library/formats/unittests/yamr_writer_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/library/formats/unittests/yson_helpers.cpp
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yt/yt/library/formats/unittests/50a4baadff663ce8fbdc82d4d2a5691e.cpp
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yt/yt/library/formats/unittests/protobuf_format_ut.pb.h
)


add_test(
  NAME
  unittester-formats
  COMMAND
  unittester-formats
)

set_property(
  TEST
  unittester-formats
  PROPERTY
  LABELS
  MEDIUM
)

set_property(
  TEST
  unittester-formats
  PROPERTY
  ENVIRONMENT
)

target_proto_outs(unittester-formats
  --cpp_out=${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yt
  --cpp_styleguide_out=${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yt
)

target_proto_addincls(unittester-formats
  ./yt
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/protobuf/src
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/apache/orc-format/src/main/proto/orc/proto
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/protobuf/src
)

resources(unittester-formats
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/yt/yt/library/formats/unittests/50a4baadff663ce8fbdc82d4d2a5691e.cpp
  INPUTS
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/library/cpp/type_info/ut/test-data/good-types.txt
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/library/cpp/type_info/ut/test-data/bad-types.txt
  KEYS
  /types/good
  /types/bad
  OPTS
)

vcs_info(unittester-formats)

set_property(
  TEST
  unittester-formats
  PROPERTY
  PROCESSORS
  1
)
